game.name: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault
game.desc: MoHAA puts you in the role of a World War II infantryman, Lt. James Powell. Missions include assaulting Nazi bases in Algiers and Norway, storming Omaha Beach on D-Day, and rescuing comrades behind enemy lines in occupied France.

game.name: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault - Spearhead
game.desc: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault - Spearhead is an expansion pack for MoHAA. As Sergeant Jack Barnes, you start behind enemy lines on D-Day and fight through the Battle of the Bulge to the fall of Berlin in nine new single-player missions.

game.name: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault - Breakthrough
game.desc: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault - Breakthrough is the second expansion pack for MoHAA. As Sergeant John Baker, you fight through World War II locations, from North Africa to Italy, in eleven new levels.
